name: npc_dota_hero_muerta
bio_loc:
There are as many stories about Muerta as there are graves in the Carrion Fields of Gorm. Some tell their children ghost stories of a young peasant girl returned from the dead to punish the bandits who killed her family. Others, drunk in dark taverns, slur conspiracy theories about kidnappings and phantom guilds of killers.

One constant bleeds through every tale: of a woman so consumed by hate for those who killed her that she refused to die. And of Death, so impressed by whatever hate-filled engine that drove this woman that he gave her Mercy and Grace — twin ethereal pistols — and made her his second in command. Now she hunts down wayward souls whose last grains have tumbled from their hourglass, and drags them kicking and screaming to their eternal reward.
hype_loc: Muerta is a master of death who stalks the lands of life, corralling targets with fearsome trickshots and summoning revenants to smother her foes. Always ready to pick off unwary targets with her spare gunhand, Muerta is at her most menacing when she crosses the veil of the dead to strike her enemies with the ethereal fury of the damned.
npe_desc_loc: Blasts fearsome trickshots and unleashes ethereal ruin

facets.description_loc: The Calling becomes stronger when heroes die inside it.
facets.name: muerta_dance_of_the_dead

facets.description_loc: Muerta can place a beneficial Ofrenda on the map to respawn there instead of the fountain.
facets.name: muerta_ofrenda

abilities.name: muerta_dead_shot
abilities.desc_loc:
Muerta fires a ghostly trickshot at an enemy unit or tree. When the bullet strikes, it damages and briefly slows, then ricochets in the targeted direction.

The ricochet damages all units that it passes through, stopping when it hits a hero. Heroes hit by the ricochet are feared away from the impact.
abilities.lore_loc: A steady gunhand and an eternity of practice produce trickshots that defy the mortal mind.
notes_loc: Feared enemies are phased and unslowable.
The ricochet will travel %ricochet_distance_multiplier%x Dead Shot's cast range.
Can ricochet off of magic immune targets.

abilities.name: muerta_the_calling
abilities.desc_loc: Summons a group of %num_revenants% revenants that slowly circle the targeted location. Enemies within the area are slowed and have reduced attack speed. Revenants deal damage and silence enemies as they pass through them.
abilities.lore_loc: Muerta's family are forever beyond the spirit veil, but her deal with Death allows her to briefly call on them in times of want or need.
facets_loc: Heroes killed inside The Calling refresh its duration, create another Revenant, and expand the radius of The Calling by %kill_radius_expansion%.

abilities.name: muerta_gunslinger
abilities.desc_loc: Toggleable. When toggled on, Muerta's attacks have a chance to fire a second shot at another target.
abilities.lore_loc: Muerta offers all of her victims Mercy. Some are fortunate enough to also earn Grace.
notes_loc: If no other units are in range, she fires both guns at the original target.
Secondary shots can hit units within Muerta's attack range plus %target_search_bonus_range%.
The secondary shot can trigger attack modifiers.

abilities.name: muerta_parting_shot
abilities.desc_loc:
Muerta precisely shoots a hero in their soul, separating it from their physical body and knocking it %knockback_distance% units away.
The soul is untargetable, muted, disarmed, and invulnerable for %debuff_duration% seconds.
The body is stunned and has %damage_reduction_percent%%% damage reduction for this duration.

After the effect ends the hero's soul is forcefully returned to their body applying a strong dispel. The soul will survive until the end of the effect even if the hero is killed.
notes_loc: Debuff Immune units will take the damage from the shot but not be separated from their body.
Allied heroes hit with Parting Shot will not be damaged.

abilities.name: muerta_pierce_the_veil
abilities.desc_loc:
Muerta transforms, becoming immune to physical damage. All of her attack damage is dealt as magical damage and Muerta gains bonus attack damage and phased movement.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore_loc: Muerta sheds her corporeal form, crossing the spirit veil and striking her enemies with the fury of the damned.
notes_loc: Muerta will dodge projectiles upon transformation.
Muerta cannot attack buildings while transformed.
Other ethereal effects will not stop Muerta from being able to attack.
abilities.shard_loc:
Muerta gains %spell_lifesteal%%% Spell Lifesteal during Pierce the Veil.
While Pierce the Veil is active Muerta permanently gains %spell_amp_steal%%% spell amplification each time she kills an enemy Hero or they die in her vicinity. Bonus applies retroactively.

abilities.name: muerta_supernatural
abilities.desc_loc: Muerta can always attack when she is ethereal. Muerta can always attack ethereal targets. When attacking ethereal targets, all of her attack damage is dealt as magical damage.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_muerta_calling_hp_regen
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_hp_regen_pct}% Max HP Regen while inside The Calling

abilities.name: muerta_ofrenda
abilities.desc_loc:
Muerta places a sacred altar at the targeted location that increases her attack speed when she is near it.

When respawning, Muerta will gain the benefits of Pierce The Veil's corporeal form for %pierce_the_veil_duration_pct%%% of the duration and respawn at the Ofrenda.

Muerta can select the Ofrenda and force it to destroy itself. Only one Ofrenda can exist at a time.
